alert.note: Alert for Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 4:10AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Ellis, Roger Mills, northwestern Custer and southern Dewey Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 409 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Putnam to 5 miles east of Moorewood to 6 miles southeast of Strong City to near Durham. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Taloga, Hammon, Leedey, Custer City, Butler, Strong City, Putnam, Angora, Moorewood, Crawford, Roll, Durham, Foss Reservoir and Hucmac. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Severe weather is not expected and no warnings are anticipated at this time. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
